verses.text: In Judah, God is known. His name is great in Israel.
\w His|strong="H3045"\w* tabernacle \w is|strong="H8034"\w* \w also|strong="H8034"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* Salem. \w His|strong="H3045"\w* dwelling place \w in|strong="H3478"\w* Zion.

\w There|strong="H1961"\w* he broke \w the|strong="H1961"\w* flaming arrows \w of|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* bow, \w the|strong="H1961"\w* shield, \w and|strong="H6726"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* sword, \w and|strong="H6726"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* weapons \w of|strong="H1961"\w* war. \qs Selah.\qs*
Glorious \w are|strong="H4421"\w* \w you|strong="H7665"\w*, \w and|strong="H2719"\w* excellent, \w more|strong="H4421"\w* than mountains \w of|strong="H2719"\w* game.
Valiant men lie plundered, they have slept \w their|strong="H2964"\w* last sleep. None \w of|strong="H2042"\w* the men \w of|strong="H2042"\w* war can lift \w their|strong="H2964"\w* hands.

\w At|strong="H3808"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* rebuke, \w God|strong="H3808"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* Jacob, \w both|strong="H3605"\w* chariot \w and|strong="H3027"\w* horse \w are|strong="H3027"\w* cast \w into|strong="H3027"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* dead \w sleep|strong="H8142"\w*.

You, even you, \w are|strong="H5483"\w* \w to|strong="H3290"\w* \w be|strong="H3290"\w* feared. Who can stand \w in|strong="H7393"\w* \w your|strong="H3290"\w* sight \w when|strong="H3290"\w* you \w are|strong="H5483"\w* angry?
\w You|strong="H6440"\w* pronounced judgement \w from|strong="H6440"\w* heaven. \w The|strong="H6440"\w* earth \w feared|strong="H3372"\w*, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w was|strong="H6440"\w* silent,

\w when|strong="H8085"\w* \w God|strong="H8064"\w* arose \w to|strong="H8085"\w* judgement, \w to|strong="H8085"\w* save all \w the|strong="H8085"\w* afflicted ones \w of|strong="H3372"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w earth|strong="H8064"\w*. \qs Selah.\qs*

\w Surely|strong="H6965"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* wrath \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w man|strong="H3605"\w* praises \w you|strong="H3605"\w*. \w The|strong="H3605"\w* survivors \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* wrath \w are|strong="H4941"\w* restrained.

\w Make|strong="H3588"\w* vows \w to|strong="H2534"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3588"\w* God, \w and|strong="H3034"\w* fulfil \w them|strong="H3588"\w*! Let all \w of|strong="H7611"\w* \w his|strong="H3588"\w* neighbours bring presents \w to|strong="H2534"\w* \w him|strong="H3588"\w* \w who|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H2534"\w* \w to|strong="H2534"\w* \w be|strong="H3588"\w* feared.

\w He|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* cut off \w the|strong="H3605"\w* spirit \w of|strong="H3068"\w* princes. \w He|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w feared|strong="H4172"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* kings \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* earth.
